Package seng202.team5.service

Class RouteService

java.lang.Object
seng202.team5.service.RouteService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Service
public class RouteService
extends java.lang.Object
implements Service
RouteService Contains the functions save, update, delete, getData, and validity check functions for routes that interact with Accessors. Implements the Service interface.

  • Constructor Details

    • RouteService

      public RouteService()
      Constructor for RouteService. Creates a RouteAccessor, AirlineAccessor, and AirportAccessor.

  • Method Details

    • save

      public int save​(java.lang.String airline, java.lang.String sourceAirport, java.lang.String destAirport, java.lang.String codeshare, int stops, java.lang.String equipment)
      Checks the validity of input parameters and then passes them into the save method of the RouteAccessor as an ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      airline - The 2-letter IATA code or 3-letter ICAO code of the airline, cannot be null.
      sourceAirport - The 3-letter IATA code or 4-letter ICAO code of the source airport, cannot be null.
      destAirport - The 3-letter IATA code or 4-letter ICAO code of the destination airport, cannot be null.
      codeshare - "Y" if the flight is operated by a different airline, otherwise "N". Cannot be null.
      stops - The number of stops for the flight, 0 if it is direct. An integer, cannot be null.
      equipment - 3-letter codes for plane types(s) commonly used for this flight, separated by spaces. Cannot be null.
      Returns:
      int result The route_id of the route that was just created by the RouteAccessor.

    • update

      public int update​(int id, java.lang.String newAirline, java.lang.String newSourceAirport, java.lang.String newDestAirport, java.lang.String newCodeshare, java.lang.Integer newStops, java.lang.String newEquipment) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Checks the validity of input parameters and then passes them into the update method of the RouteAccessor.
      Parameters:
      id - The route_id of the given route you want to update.
      newAirline - The new 2-letter IATA or 3-letter ICAO code of the airline, may be null if not to be updated.
      newSourceAirport - The new 3-letter IATA or 4-letter ICAO code of the source airport, may be null if not to be updated.
      newDestAirport - The new 3-letter IATA or 4-letter ICAO code of the destination airport, may be null if not to be updated.
      newCodeshare - The new codeshare of the route, "Y" or "N", may be null if not to be updated.
      newStops - The new number of stops for the route, an integer, may be -1 if not to be updated.
      newEquipment - The new equipment for the route, may be null if not to be updated.
      Returns:
      int result The route_id of the route that was just updated by the RouteAccessor.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException

    • delete

      public boolean delete​(int id)
      Checks if the route to be deleted exists, and if it does then passes the route_id into the delete method of RouteAccessor.
      Specified by:
      delete in interface Service
      Parameters:
      id - The route_id of the route to be deleted.
      Returns:
      boolean result True if the delete operation is successful, False otherwise.

    • getData

      public java.sql.ResultSet getData​(int id)
      Retrieves the route with specified id.
      Specified by:
      getData in interface Service
      Parameters:
      id - int value of an id.
      Returns:
      ResultSet of a route.

    • getData

      public java.sql.ResultSet getData​(java.lang.String airline)
      Retrieves the route with the given airline code.
      Parameters:
      airline - String, airline IATA/ICAO code.
      Returns:
      ResultSet of a route.

    • getData

      public java.sql.ResultSet getData​(java.lang.String source_airport, java.lang.String dest_airport, int stops, java.lang.String equipment)
      Retrieves all routes with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      source_airport - string containing aiport IATA/ICAO.
      dest_airport - string containing aiport IATA/ICAO.
      stops - int containing number of stops.
      equipment - string containing type of equipment.
      Returns:
      ResultSet of routes.

    • getMaxID

      public int getMaxID()
      Calls the getMaxID method of the RouteAccessor to get the maximum route_id contained in the database.
      Returns:
      int The maximum route_id contained in the database.
